mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref) values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.currval)
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=sysdate where seq=#{seq}
update board set step=step+1 where ref = #{ref} and step > #{step}
update board set reply=reply+1 where seq=#{pseq}
update board set hit=hit+1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select count(*) from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
